turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick me up something from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Starbucks on 4th Street in Santa Ana.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want can other changes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add a shot of espresso and substitute the milk with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it to have one shot or to add an additional shot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: An additional shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want a grande cherry mocha with an add shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Don't forget to substitute the milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've ordered it at the Starbucks on 4th St. in Santa Ana.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will take it before it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A text will tell you when it's ready. There will also be a receipt.
